Description: Weft-faced plain weave, undyed/cream wool cloth from the sleeve of a child's tunic with tapestry (single warp threads) bars; Two bars in light purple wool and undyed linen; Design of light on dark, stylised plants along the centre, zig-zag and dotted borders; Warp: S spun wool, c.15tpc; Weft: S spun cream wool, c.46tpc, Z spun purple wool, c.52tpc; Edges: two reinforced selvedges (two grouped warps threads, extra circuits of main weft), other edges cut or ragged
Curator's comments: Unreg 80; Includes bag of soiling/fibres removed during conservation; Previousy located cupboard P and in grey plan chest in Students' Room; Similar border on EA72453; Information from Hero Granger-Taylor (15.5.1991)
